type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Formula Value Not A Number

definition.text: When evaluated by teh LF Trading Bot, a Formula must return a numeric value. In this case it did not, and for that reason this error happened..

paragraphs.text: While running at the TS, the Low Frequency Trading Bot encountered an error while trying to evaluate one of your formulas defined at the Trading System. Formulas are supposed to return a numeric value an this one did not.
In the following section you will find the specific information received when this error occured.
You will only see it if you opened this page as a result of the error actually happening.
The follwing is the node's name of the Node most related to this error:
The follwing is the code stored at the node that produced the error at the LF Trading Bot:
The follwing is the value of the node at the moment that this error happened at the LF Trading Bot:
